name: Node-Red Dashboard Custom CSS
format:
<style>
    /* Main background with image */
    body {
        background-image: url('https://media.istockphoto.com/id/1395068267/fr/vid%C3%A9o/main-rapproch%C3%A9e-planter-un-arbre.jpg?s=640x640&k=20&c=0Jh2TTUsM9Ym026ysC3zHGxafIqEkjT2907QTAUqdr0=');
        /* Remplacez par le chemin de votre image */
        background-size: cover;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-attachment: fixed;
        background-position: center;
        margin: 0;
        color: white; /* Couleur du texte en blanc */
    }

    /* Top bar */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar,
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
        background-color: #65793c;
        color: white !important; /* Couleur du texte en blanc */
    }

    /* Left menu */
    /* Sidebar */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav {
        color: white !important; /* Couleur du texte en blanc */
        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) !important;
    }

    /* Hover selection */
    a.md-no-style,
    button.md-no-style {
        border-radius: 10px !important;
    }

    /* Selected */
    .nr-menu-item-active div button {
        border-right: 4px solid #509f2e !important;
        /* Bordure de sélection verte */
    }

    /* List */
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav div.md-list-item-inner {
        color: white !important; /* Couleur du texte en blanc */
        background-color: #8dc63f !important;
        /* Fond vert clair */
        border-radius: 10px !important;
    }

    /* Groups */
    ui-card-panel {
        background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
        border-radius: 10px !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel {
        border: none !important;
    }

    /* Name groups */
    .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
        color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) !important;
    }

    /* Buttons */
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
        background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, .1) !important;
        color: white !important; /* Couleur du texte en blanc */
    }

    .md-button {
        border-radius: 10px !important;
    }

    /* Dropdown menu */
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu {
        background-color: #8dc63f !important;
        /* Fond vert clair */
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu,
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option {
        background-color: transparent !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .md-select-menu-container {
        border-radius: 10px !important;
        border: none !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option[selected] {
        color: white !important; /* Couleur du texte en blanc */
        background-color: #509f2e !important;
        /* Fond vert foncé */
    }

    /* Template */
    md-card>img,
    md-card>md-card-header img,
    md-card md-card-title-media img {
        border-radius: 10px !important;
    }

    /* Color picker text BG */
    .nr-dashboard-theme .color-picker-input-wrapper>input {
        color: white !important; /* Couleur du texte en blanc */
        background-color: transparent !important;
    }
</style>
